department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Replenishment of 950,000 litres of marine fuel.
description: The End User is seeking suppliers for the replenishment of 950,000 litres of fuel.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
full_summary:
# Canadian Coast Guard - RFP F1818-241000-A for Marine Fuel Supply
### Short Description
The Canadian Coast Guard's Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for the supply and delivery of up to 950,000 litres of finished, blended marine fuel to Vancouver and Victoria, British Columbia. The fuel must contain 50% by volume of synthetic hydrocarbon components, 20% biodiesel, and the balance conventional hydrocarbons.

### Key Dates

* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-07
* **Tender Closing Date (Updated):** 2024-04-15 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Supply Period:** May 10th to July 15th, 2024

### Mandatory Requirements

* Bid submission must be made on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19023215?extsite=MTkwMjMyMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* All supporting documentation must be submitted in the required format.

### Indigenous Participation

* The Government encourages Bidders to submit an Indigenous Participation Plan (IPP) as part of their offer. A detailed description of the IPP criteria and evaluation process can be found in the solicitation document (Annex F: Indigenous Participation Plan Criteria).

### Amendments
* Please disregard the initial Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time.

### Procurement Details

* The procurement is open and competitive.
* The following trade agreements are applicable:
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
